text: Vernuvshis' domoy, oni rasskazali ottsu o pravitele Yegipta, o tom, kak khorosho on ikh prinyal, i o tom, chto on predupredil ikh, chto ne dast v budushchem prodovol'stviya, yesli oni ne privedut s soboy Benyamina. A yesli oni privedut yego k nemu, on obeshchal dat' polnuyu meru i prinyat' ikh khorosho. Oni skazali: "Otpusti brata s nami. Yesli ty soglasish'sya otpustit' yego, to my poluchim vso nuzhnoye nam prodovol'stviye. My uveryayem tebya, chto my prilozhim vse nashi usiliya, chtoby sberech' yego
